name: 埃利亚的芝诺
bio_short: 古希腊哲学家，埃利亚学派的成员，巴门尼德的学生。他以提出一系列挑战“运动”和“多元性”的著名悖论（如“阿喀琉斯与乌龟”）而闻名。
bio_short_en: An ancient Greek philosopher of the Eleatic School and a student of Parmenides. He is famous for proposing a series of paradoxes (like 'Achilles and the Tortoise') that challenged the concepts of motion and plurality.
